onboarding.welcome_description: Easily manage your mobile credit and data plans. Top up your balance and stay connected anytime, anywhere.
onboarding.choose_your_language: Available in your language and Dutch, Spanish and Portuguese
onboarding.use_without_internet: Your data stays on your device, 100% private.
onboarding.touch: Manage your data plan in seconds
onboarding.touch_description: Check your balance, recharge your data plan, transfer balance and much more in a couple of taps.

home.title: Home
home.transfer_balance_description: Transfer your balance to another account
home.private_number_title: Do you want to make your number private?
home.private_number_text: When you activate your private number, your number will be hidden from the person you are calling until you deactivate it.
home.first_time_transfer_title: Is this your first time transferring balance?
home.first_time_transfer_text: In order to transfer balance, you need to set a pincode. Do you want to set a pincode now?

transfer.contacts_permission_error: You need to give permission to access your contacts

settings.title: Settings
